SystemCore.name: SystemCore
SystemCore.description: Core system initialization, interrupt handlers, and main loop
SystemCore.documentation: Handles system startup, IRQ/NMI processing, and main game loop

BattleEngine.description: Combat system, AI, damage calculations, and battle UI
BattleEngine.documentation: Complete battle system implementation including turn order, spells, and AI

WorldEngine.name: WorldEngine
WorldEngine.description: Overworld navigation, collision detection, and map management
WorldEngine.documentation: Handles world map movement, transitions, and collision systems

MenuSystem.name: MenuSystem
MenuSystem.description: UI management, inventory, character status, and save/load
MenuSystem.documentation: Complete menu interface including item management and character progression

TextEngine.name: TextEngine
TextEngine.description: Dialog system, text rendering, and script processing
TextEngine.documentation: Text display engine with compression and variable-width font support

AudioEngine.name: AudioEngine
AudioEngine.description: Music playback, sound effects, and audio streaming
AudioEngine.documentation: Audio system with instrument samples and music sequencing

GraphicsEngine.name: GraphicsEngine
GraphicsEngine.description: Sprite rendering, background processing, and visual effects
GraphicsEngine.documentation: Graphics rendering pipeline with sprite management and effects

SaveSystem.name: SaveSystem
SaveSystem.description: Game state persistence, SRAM management, and data validation
SaveSystem.documentation: Save/load system with checksum validation and state management

GameData.name: GameData
GameData.description: Static game data including items, spells, monsters, and maps
GameData.documentation: All game content data tables and configuration
